GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ARM: dts: qcom: replace gcc PXO with pxo_board fixed clock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 0a4fa4ce697987b71eafce17bb198961ed9070bd, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 40cf5c884a965554a424797afb424ffbca4c24b3. For more details please see the references link.
